text: Happy Monday all! Has anyone looked into getting Hotjar working with embedded HubSpot forms? Hotjar won't find forms that live in an iframe. Unfortunately we don't use HubSpot CMS for some websites here, so have to marry HubSpot forms, Drupal and Hotjar.
we use hotjar and this is an issue we've been following along with on the support forums, it was just moved from a proposed idea to in development a couple weeks ago
